Loader
public class OkHttpLoader
extends Object
implements Loader

A Loader which uses OkHttp to download images.

Constructor Detail

OkHttpLoader

public OkHttpLoader(android.content.Context context)
Create new loader that uses OkHttp. This will install an image cache into your application cache directory.

OkHttpLoader

public OkHttpLoader(com.squareup.okhttp.OkHttpClient client)
Create a new loader that uses the specified OkHttp instance. A response cache will not be automatically configured.

Method Detail

load

public Loader.Response load(String url,
                            boolean localCacheOnly)
                     throws IOException
Description copied from interface: Loader
Download the specified image url from the internet.

Specified by:
load in interface Loader
Parameters:
url - Remote image URL.
localCacheOnly - If true the URL should only be loaded if available in a local disk cache.
Returns:
InputStream and boolean indicating whether or not the image is being loaded from a local disk cache. Must not be null.
Throws:
IOException - if the requested URL cannot successfully be loaded.
